attributes.action: Ensure that the BBC does not drop the cult television programme, Neighbours
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Neighbours has, since its first airing in 1986, made a phenomenal contribution to the social fabric of the UK.  Due to legal wrangling, the BBC are considering dropping the programme: 

"Long-running Australian soap Neighbours could be dropped by the BBC following protracted negotiations over broadcasting rights. 

The BBC said that if agreement was not reached in the "very, very near future" the money would be allocated elsewhere."

Read more here: http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/entertainment/6595591.stm

We wish to impress on the Prime Minister the importance of Neighbours to popular UK culture.  Please don't let the BBC do this.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
